an2.130:1.1: “Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam samma ayacamano ayaceyya:
an2.130:1.3: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savakanam bhikkhunam yadidam sariputtamoggallana”ti.
an2.131:1.1: “Saddha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuni evam samma ayacamana ayaceyya:
an2.131:1.2: ‘tadisi homi yadisi khema ca bhikkhuni uppalavanna ca’ti.
an2.131:1.3: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savikanam bhikkhuninam yadidam khema ca bhikkhuni uppalavanna ca”ti.
an2.132:1.1: “Saddho, bhikkhave, upasako evam samma ayacamano ayaceyya:
an2.132:1.2: ‘tadiso homi yadiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca alavako’ti.
an2.132:1.3: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savakanam upasakanam yadidam citto ca gahapati hatthako ca alavako”ti.
an2.133:1.1: “Saddha, bhikkhave, upasika evam samma ayacamana ayaceyya:
an2.133:1.2: ‘tadisi homi yadisi khujjuttara ca upasika velukandakiya ca nandamata’ti.
an2.133:1.3: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savikanam upasikanam yadidam khujjuttara ca upasika velukandakiya ca nandamata”ti.
an2.134:1.1: “Dvihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an2.134:1.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvihi dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavatiti.
an2.134:2.1: Dvihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an2.134:2.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvihi dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati”ti.
